mapper.select: SELECT T1.CUST_NAME,T2.ADMIN_USER_NAME,T2.ADMIN_ORG_NAME,to_char(T1.INPUT_DT,'yyyy-MM-dd') as INPUT_DT, T1.IS_WARN_FLAG,T1.SIGNAL_NO,T2.ADMIN_BRANCH_NAME, T1.CUST_NO,T2.IS_TOL_AUTH,T1.CREATE_NAME FROM DC_AP_SIGNAL_MANUAL T1 LEFT JOIN DC_AP_CUST_INFO T2 on T1.CUST_NO=T2.CUST_NO where IS_WARN_FLAG = '1'
